data.persona: We are the king's personal army. We are an elite group separate from the main army. We train everyday to be the best we can be. We honor a strict code of chivalry that applies to peasant and royal alike.
data.description:
You are in the Beside temple entrance.
The entrance to the temple is quite hidden - shrouded by many trees and shrubs. One wouldn't even think to give it a second glance, as the stone that was used to create the entrance is worn down. The textures and characters that once adorned the entrance are memories of the past.
There's a stone, a tree, and a shrub here.
The archaeologists is here.

You are carrying a shield, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: Let archaeologists know you're there and in charge

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow archaeologists quietly and hide from them

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go further in the entrance to get closer to archaeologists

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go where the archaeologists retreat to
